DOC.brief_summary: Phase I Part : To determine maximum tolerate dose ( MTD ) pharmacokinetics BIBW 2992 administered combination TMZ patient recurrent malignant glioma ( WHO Grade III IV ) . Phase II Part : To estimate efficacy safety BIBW 2992 monotherapy BIBW 2992 / TMZ combination therapy compare TMZ monotherapy ( three treatment arm ) patient recurrent GBM . To evaluate molecular determinant response BIBW 2992 .
